generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a bicycle lane symbol, indicating it is a road for vehicles.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and fences.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background and on the sides of the road.
- fence: A wooden fence is visible on the left side of the road, and a metal fence is visible on the right side.
- pole: A pole with traffic signs is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on the pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Some grass and soil are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, above the buildings and trees.
- car: A red car is parked on the right side of the road.
- truck: A truck is visible in the distance, driving down the road.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
